commit.message:
Nx transpiled lib (#922)

* :wrench: Setup base NX workspace.
:recycle: Refactoring code to adhere to NX structure (move into apps and libs).
:sparkles: Added webpack plugin for extracting global variables from SCSS-files.

* :bug: Cookbook is again functional (through "ng serve", at least).

* :bug: Tests are now running (they're failing but they're able to be executed). "Computed style"-tests are however failing... and I have no clue why.

* :bug: Tests are now running (they're failing but they're able to be executed). "Computed style"-tests are however failing... and I have no clue why.

* :wrench: Tests won't fail when there are none.

* :see_no_evil: Ignore "compiled" polyfills.

* :recycle: Added "tighter" typing to "sass-to-json" processing engine.
:bug: Tool for extracting SCSS-variables to JSON didn't compile (at least not the version to run from the CLI).
:wrench: Added script (to package.json) to extract SCSS-variables to JSON (npm run extract-scss-variables).

* :construction_worker: Updated CI script (new script targets)
:wrench: publish.js can now create tarballs (when not running on CI).
:truck: Everything should be imported from '@kirbydesign/designsystem' (no more "/modal" etc.).
:wrench: Polyfills are now build (again).

* :wrench: Updated targets for linting.

* :rotating_light: Removing linter warnings.

* :construction_worker: Fixed issue with cookbook docker image (after refactoring to use NX).
:construction_worker: Fixed issue with travis configuration (building distribution for everything, not just designsystem).
:wrench: Removed debug console.log left-in on publish.js-file.

* :recycle: Refactoring publish.js script (improved readability and documentation).

* :lipstick: Replaced NX favicon.ico with that of kirby's

* :wrench: Fix for missing SVG icons in distribution bundle.

* :art: Formatting package.json output distribution NPM package.

* :bug: imported JSON files couldn't be resolved from NPM-package (now importing using ES2015 module imports, and not using require - resulting in inlined JSON).
:bug: disabled annotations for closure compiler (due to incompatibility with imported JSON)
:bug: peerDependencies in packaged package.json was missing dependencies upon CDK, Ionic and Highcharts
:refactor: added additional barrel files, and added to existing barrel files (was missing a couple of exports)
:wrench: Added additional console (information) log messages to package json, and added polyfills to NPM package.

* Removed index.d.ts file from toast-component (should be produced by nbc compiler, and not checked in).

* Removed index.d.ts file from testing-folder (should be produced by nbc compiler, and not checked in).

* :bug: Added CDK and Ionic as dependencies to package.json (not peerDependencies)

* :sparkles: Now extracting SCSS to ts-files.
:recycle: Refactored code to use global variables / style definitions from ts (instead of JSON).
:wrench: Reconfigured tsconfig to annotate bundle for closure compiler (reverted from previous experiment).

* :lipstick: Fixing issue with colors showcase not displaying correctly.
:pencil2: Missing type-declaratiosn for custom jasmine matchers.

* :wrench: Fixed "get computed style"-tests, due to misconfiguration in angular.json (global styles weren't included, hence no CSS4 variables set).

* :construction_worker: Didn't extract global variables (styling) from SCSS-variables, making test fail (since test build relies on those files as well).

* :twisted_rightwards_arrows: Merged master into branch (fixed conflicts, failing functionality etc.).

* :bug: Changes to TextAreaComponent resulted in component not being able to p√• ngc-compiled.. Changed private methods to be public.

* :bulb: Added documentation to README.md and updated issue templates.

* :bug: Preventing ts-lint errors on generated TS-files that are extracted from SCSS-files.

* :twisted_rightwards_arrows: Fixed error occurred during "git automated merge".

* :bug: ngpackagr didn't want to process DropdownComponent due to private field bindings to host

* ‚ûï Add `chokidar` dev dependency

* :sparkles: Add sass-to-ts

* ‚è™ Revert changes for sass-extract-loader

* :art: Move `extract-scss-variables` to predist script

* :recycle: Use `DesignTokenHelper` for typography

* :recycle: Use camelCase `*.styles.ts` file

* :bug: Render SassStrings as primitives

* :fire: Delete sass-to-json

* :recycle: Add `getTargetFileName` method

* :lipstick: Improve logging

* :fire: :recycle: Remove custom webpack from `serve`

* :fire: Remove obsolete code

* :bug: ng-packagr unable to build due to lambda in static functions and strictMetaDataEmit

* :bug: Removed ts-lint failing to lint ".styles.ts"-files (formatted generated code with prettier)

* :heavy_minus_sign: removed dependency upon sass-extract-loader
:recycle: colors-showcase.component.ts now utilizes color-helper.ts instead of "loading SCSS-file"

* :recycle: Convert plugin to class/ts

* :recycle: Transpile all sass values to string

* :recycle: Add explicit typing to parameters

* :art: Simplify color maps + functions

* ‚úÖ Use `toHaveComputedStyle` test helper

* :art: Simplify template

* üí° Update comment

* üí° Comment

* :sparkles: Add testing project

* :sparkles: :wrench: Add generate-mocks tool

* :sparkles: Support multiple classes in 1 file

* :pencil2: Typo

* :wrench: Use `kirby` as directive prefix

* :wrench: Add `@kirbydesign/designsystem` to paths

* üì¶ Export `ListShape`

* :sparkles: Add mock components

* :lipstick: Add prettier formatting

* :wrench: Fix imports

* :truck: Inline testing project in designsystem lib

* :fire: Remove obsolete typings

* :recycle: Move paths to method params...
...and use path util for joining paths

* :wrench: Add `generate-mocks` script...
...and run as pre-script to `dist:designsystem`

* ‚ûïAdd hard dependencies

* üîñBump version to `1.0.0`

* ‚è™ Revert to `peerDependencies`

* :truck: Create separate jest/jasmine entry points

* :truck: Update `generate-mocks` script

* :truck: Move `highcharts`+`moment` to hard dependencies

* :clown_face: Added mocks / spies for Jest.

* :bug: Fixed issue with kirby-testing.module.ts (in testing-jest)-entrypoint failing, due to missing type dependency upon @types/jest.

* üèÅFix `publish.js` script for Windows

* :label: Fixed issue with types being loaded for building tools/tslint-rules

* :pencil: Added to migration and configuration documentation (in README.md)

* :fire: Delete deprecated list components

* :fire: Deprecate `kirbyListItem`+`kirbyListFlexItem` directives

* :pencil: Replaced bad reg-ex for sed ("change log"-section of README.md)

* :pencil: Attempt at fixing bad links (by reference) in readme.md.

* :pencil: Take 2 at attempt at fixing bad links (by reference) in readme.md (needed more cowbell....errr, whitespace).

* :pencil: Added badge to indicate status of build status on travis-ci (for default branch)

* :art: Add missing type definitions

* :wrench: Infer type from initialiser

* :recycle: Use type guards

* :art: Improve import generation

* :fire: Remove `nullable`

* :fire: Remove obsolete interface

* :fire: Remove obsolete nullable tokens

* :fire: Remove obsolete interface

* :fire: Remove obsolete base class

* :pencil: Removed obsolete note on legacy kirby setup.
:pencil: Moved certain links to be references (at bottom of file)

* :white_check_mark: Fixed failing tests (using removed / deprecated components)

* :memo: Update readme

* :memo: Add deprecation section

* :pencil: Removed white-space (blank line) from code sample.

* :pencil: Corrected grammar.

* :pencil: Documented tools-script.
:pencil: Documented contents of tools/generate-mocks folder.

* :memo: Add header regarding migration

* :wrench: Only generate mocks for exported components

* :art: Simplify import

* :sparkles: :clown_face: Provide mocked component as real component

* üö® Fix linting

* üö® Add linebreak

* üö® Add testing folders to lint script

* :wrench: Don't generate mocks in predist

* :art: Add missing type

* :art: Add missing Input properties

* :art: Add missing binding property

* :bug: Fix missing properties + binding property name

* :sparkles: Add ThemeColor mock directive

* ‚úÖ Fix tests

* :art: Use CRLR for newline

* :art: Fix property type

* ü§° Update auto-generated mock

* :wrench: Generate mocks on pre-commit

* üîñ Bump version to 1.0.0

Co-authored-by: Jakob Engelbrecht Olesen <jakob@basher.dk>
